name: Numa - Mech Survival Saga
description:
Meet the mech Numa, very beautiful and kind robot.
Numa was turned up in an unfamiliar world and during the crash, he broke all the ruins.
Build your mech Numa and help him to restore all the ruins.

Make your way through crowds of enemies to new locations.
Choose the weapon and equipment you need
Explore the unfamiliar world in search of the necessary resources.
Re-craft resources into tools.
Use the tools to restore all the ruins.

FEATURES
● Construct your Numa mech from different blocks for different purposes in the game
● Farm and upgrade your block collection
● Collect resources and craft tools needed to restore lost ruins
● Restore all the ruins using the crafted tools
● Regular addition of new ruins and blocks
